objects.text:
4K HDMI Compatible
100W Power Delivery
3 USB-A Ports
Aluminum Design

Compatible with MacBook Pro/Air, iPad Pro,
iMac, iPhone 15 Pro/Pro Max, XPS, Thinkpad

product_details.name: BENFEI USB C Hub 5-in-1 with 4K HDMI(Certified), 100W Power Delivery, 3 USB-A, Silicone Cable, Aluminum Case Compatible with MacBook Pro/Air, iPad Pro, iMac, iPhone 15 Pro/Pro Max, XPS, Thinkpad
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 7.87 x 7.87 x 7.87 inches. Item Weight: 2.82 ounces. Country of Origin: China.

banner_details:
This banner features a sleek tech promotional design themed around a USB-C hub product. The composition showcases a strong geometric background with dual-tone diagonal sections – a deep blue gradient occupying the top left and a soft silvery-blue gradient filling the bottom right, separated by a diagonal divide. The product image ("product_image") is prominently placed in the center-right area, angled for a dynamic view. The main headline ("heading") uses a futuristic, stencil-style font in white, followed by a subheading ("subheading") in a modern blue hue. The features list ("description") and compatibility statement ("tagline") are cleanly aligned below. The large pricing text ("price") stands out in bold white, and a rectangular CTA button with the label "SHOP NOW" ("cta") is housed in a solid blue box ("cta_background"), providing a clear call to action.

**Color Palette**:
- Deep Blue: #1a3c6e
- Navy Blue: #0c2240
- Soft Sky Blue: #a8d4ff
- Silver-Gray Gradient: #a8b8c8 to #e0e5eb
- White: #ffffff
- Primary CTA Blue: #2196f3
product_color: The product image features a sleek USB-C hub with a modern and metallic design. The dominant color is a cool gradient steel gray (#4A5A68 to #A8B1B8), giving it a professional, high-tech appearance. Subtle chrome silver (#C4C7CC) is used for text “BENFEI” and connector accents, blending smoothly into darker gray tones. The USB 3.0 port adds a striking contrast with a light electric blue (#4DA6FF), drawing attention without overpowering. The braided cable is infused with deep charcoal (#2D2D2D), providing texture and durability visually. This palette is ideal for banners that emphasize sophistication and cutting-edge technology with clean, bold contrasts.
